Name: Save Octopus Output Variable
Description: Saves an [output variable](https://octopus.com/docs/deploying-applications/variables/output-variables) to the given project / library variable set

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_ApiKey
Parameters.Label: API Key
Parameters.HelpText: Provide an Octopus API Key with appropriate permissions to save the variable

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_VariableName
Parameters.Label: Variable Name
Parameters.HelpText:
Name of the [variable used when it was set](https://octopus.com/docs/deploying-applications/variables/output-variables#Outputvariables-Settingoutputvariablesusingscripts)

_Note: The same name will be given to the saved variable_

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_VariableSetType
Parameters.Label: Variable Set Type
Parameters.HelpText: If the output variable is being saved to a project or [library variable set](https://octopus.com/docs/deploying-applications/variables/library-variable-sets)

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_VariableSetName
Parameters.Label: Variable Set Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the project or [library](https://octopus.com/docs/deploying-applications/variables/library-variable-sets) variable set where the output variable should be saved

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_IsSensitive
Parameters.Label: Is Sensitive?
Parameters.HelpText: If the variable should be marked as [sensitive](https://octopus.com/docs/deploying-applications/variables/sensitive-variables) and the value masked from logs
